name: A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE PUBLISHED
description: Test sending a DELETE operation message via GPD message API after a CREATE VALID + UPDATE
descriptionHtml: Test sending a DELETE operation message via GPD message API after a CREATE VALID + UPDATE
statusMessage: AssertionError: Expected 200 for CREATE with status VALID, got 401. Response: { "statusCode": 401, "message": "Invalid JWT." }

labels.name: story
labels.value: Consumer sends DELETE message to Sender after CREATE and UPDATE
